title: Busy Philipps looks leggy in a floral dress as she runs errands in Los Angeles
text:
She's a talented actress who has had success on both the small and big screen.

And Busy Philipps put on a stellar style performance as she stepped out for a coffee run in Los Angeles on Wednesday.

The Cougar Town star, 40, put on a leggy display in a gorgeous floral print black dress with a thigh-split.

Looking good: Busy Philipps put on another stellar style performance as she stepped out for a coffee run in Los Angeles on Wednesday

The actress, who carried a coffee flask with her, added to her look with a dark green cardigan featuring an abstract white pattern.

Busy accessorised with an array of necklaces and rings, and kept comfortable in a pair of grey lace-up boots.

The mother-of-two completed her ensemble with a red and white striped shoulder bag and shades to protect her eyes from the Californian sun.

The beauty wore her honey-hued tresses in a slicked back bun and opted for minimal make-up.

Chic: The Cougar Town star, 40, put on a leggy display in a gorgeous floral print black dress with a thigh-split

The star's appearance comes after she revealed earlier this month that she almost divorced her husband, director Marc Silverstein, over parenting responsibilities.

The couple have been married since 2007 and discussed raising their two daughters Birdie Leigh, 11, and Cricket Pearl, six, during an interview with Harper's Bazaar.

She said: 'Marc was like, "I'll do anything." And I was like, "Okay, then do everything, because I have done it all, all by myself, and I'm done, dude".

'I was fully out the door. I wasn't expecting anything from him, but what we ended up doing was creating our own system.'

Busy revealed the new system has led to Marc loving mornings with his daughters.

Glamorous: The actress, who carried a coffee flask with her, added to her look with a dark green cardigan featuring an abstract white pattern

She added: 'He'll make my Bulletproof coffee and bring it into the bedroom while I'm still sleeping, and then leave to take the kids to school.

'He has conversations with them that I'm jealous of. The closeness he now has with these girls, it's really special.

'Sometimes I've wondered about Marc taking over Birdie's bedtime. I've thought to myself, "Is this the right thing for her?" But I'm not going to call him out on what I think is right or wrong because he's doing it!'

Busy suffered a professional disappointment earlier this year when her late-night talk show was cancelled.

Fashionable: Busy accessorised with an array of necklaces and rings, and kept comfortable in a pair of grey lace-up boots

Sharing the news via Instagram, Busy said: 'My show, Busy Tonight is not going to continue on E! after May 16th. They decided not to pick it up.

'Look, we're you know, meeting with people and seeing if there's another place that makes sense for it to go. Because I would like to continue doing it. We would all like to figure out a way to continue to make [it].

'It's kinda wild because you know we've only been doing the show for like a relatively short period of time, you know. Like five months, six months now.

'And in that time I feel like we've been able to accomplish so much, creatively, and you know, I guess culturally.

'And I'm so proud of all of the things that we've done, like that we've been able to do and I feel like the show is really successful in that way. You know.'
description: The actress, 40, put on a leggy display as she showed off her bronzed pins in a gorgeous floral print black dress with a thigh-split.
